General.Name: Bridge Biotherapeutics Inc
General.Description: Bridge Biotherapeutics, Inc., a clinical stage biotech company, engages in the development of therapeutics for the treatment of ulcerative colitis, fibrotic diseases, and cancers worldwide. Its products in pipeline includes BBT-401, a Pellino-1 inhibitor, which is in Phase I clinical trial for the treatment of ulcerative colitis; and BBT-877, an autotaxin inhibitor that is in Phase I clinical trial for the treatment of various fibrotic diseases, such as idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis. Bridge Biotherapeutics, Inc. has a research collaboration with Atomwise to launch small molecule programs across various therapeutic areas using structure-based AI technology for drug discovery. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Seongnam, Korea.
General.Address: Building B, Innovalley, Seongnam, South Korea, 13486
